hero.title: Sizning hamkoringiz
hero.subtitle: Barcha 50 shtatdagi yuk tashish kompaniyalari uchun to'liq Fleet Management, ELD yechimlari, Dispatch Services va muvofiqlik yordami.

stats.title: Falcon Team raqamlarda
stats.subtitle: Butun Amerika bo'ylab yuk tashish kompaniyalari bizga ishonadi

timeline.title: Bizning yo'limiz
timeline.subtitle: Kichik jamoadan milliy miqyosdagi texnologik hamkorga

2018.title: Kompaniya tashkil etildi
2018.description: Falcon Team yuk tashish muvofiqligini inqilob qilish maqsadida tashkil etildi

2020.title: ELD Platform ishga tushirildi
2020.description: Fleet Management uchun birinchi ELD yechimini ishga tushirdik

2021.title: Safety xizmatlari kengaytirildi
2021.description: DOT Compliance va Safety auditlarini qo'shdik

2024.title: O'z platformalarimiz
2024.description: Clear Path ELD va Secure Path ELD - o'z platformalarimizni ishga tushirdik

2025.title: Soha yetakchisi
2025.description: Butun mamlakat bo'ylab yuk tashish kompaniyalari uchun to'liq autsorsing yechimlari

services.title: Bizning xizmatlarimiz
services.subtitle: Yuk tashish biznesingiz uchun kompleks yechimlar

eld.title: ELD Management
eld.description: Mutaxassislar tomonidan ELD o'rnatish, 24/7 monitoring va tezkor texnik yordam

safety.title: Safety va Compliance
safety.description: DOT muvofiqlik tayyorligi, HOS tahlili, DQ fayllarini boshqaruvi va me'yoriy talablar

dispatch.title: Dispatch Services
dispatch.description: Yuk qidirish, brokerlar bilan aloqa, hujjatlar va hisob-kitoblar boshqaruvi

fleet.title: Fleet Management
fleet.description: To'liq flot nazorati, analitika, koordinatsiya va optimallashtirish

ifta.title: IFTA va Permits
ifta.description: KYU, NY HUT hisoblari, IFTA arizalashtirish va ruxsatnomalar boshqaruvi

integrations.title: IT Integrations
integrations.description: Highway, Macropoint, Trucker Tools, Project44 va boshqa platformalar

platforms.title: Bizning platformalarimiz
platforms.subtitle: Zamonaviy yuk tashish uchun o'z texnologiyalarimiz

sba.title: Clear Path ELD
sba.description: Real vaqt kuzatuvi va muvofiqlik funksiyalari bilan ilg'or ELD yechimi

securePath.title: Secure Path ELD
securePath.description: Kuchaytirilgan xavfsizlik va analitika bilan korporativ darajadagi ELD platformasi

clients.title: Kimga xizmat ko'rsatamiz
clients.subtitle: Har qanday turdagi yuk tashish biznesi uchun individual yechimlar

ownerOperator.title: Owner-Operator
ownerOperator.description: Ishonchli muvofiqlik va dispatcher yordamini qidirayotgan individual yuk mashina egalari

fleet.title: Fleet kompaniyalari
fleet.description: Kompleks Fleet Management ga muhtoj 5-100+ yuk mashinalari bo'lgan kompaniyalar

centralAsian.title: Markaziy Osiyo tadbirkorlari
centralAsian.description: AQSh yuk tashish sohasidagi o'sib borayotgan Markaziy Osiyo tadbirkorlariga yordam

mission.title: Bizning missiya va qadriyatlarimiz
mission.subtitle: Yuk tashish texnologiyalarida mukammallik orqali ishonch qurish

cta.title: Biznesingizni rivojlantirishga tayyormisiz?
